hero.description: Track calories, discover nutritious meals, follow personalized diet plans, and connect with certified coaches all in one place.

features.mainHeading: Powerful Features for Your Wellness Journey
features.description: YamiFit provides you with comprehensive tools to track nutrition, plan meals, and achieve your health goals with expert guidance.
features.calorieTrackingDesc: Monitor your daily intake with precision. Track macros, calories, and nutritional values effortlessly.
features.personalizedMealsDesc: Discover healthy recipes tailored to your dietary preferences, goals, and nutritional needs.
features.dietSubscriptionsDesc: Subscribe to curated meal plans designed by nutrition experts for sustainable results.
features.coachingChatDesc: Connect with certified coaches for personalized guidance, motivation, and expert advice.
features.mealDeliveryDesc: Track your healthy meal deliveries in real-time and never miss a nutritious meal.
features.smartAnalyticsDesc: Get AI-powered insights on your progress, patterns, and personalized recommendations.

howItWorks.description: Get started in minutes and transform your health journey
howItWorks.step1Desc: Set your goals, dietary preferences, and health metrics to get personalized recommendations.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Log your meals, monitor your progress, and discover healthy recipes tailored just for you.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Connect with certified coaches and receive personalized advice to stay on track.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Follow your personalized plan and watch as your health and wellness transform.

pricing.description: Choose the perfect plan for your fitness journey

faq.description: Find answers to common questions about YamiFit
faq.q1: How do I start tracking my meals?
faq.a1: Simply create an account, set your goals, and start logging your meals using our extensive food database. Our AI will help track your progress.
faq.q2: Can I use YamiFit without a coach?
faq.a2: Absolutely! You can use YamiFit independently with our self-guided features. However, coaching is available if you want personalized guidance.
faq.a3: Our 7-day free trial gives you full access to Premium features at no cost. No credit card required to start your trial.
faq.q4: Can I change my meal subscription?
faq.a4: Yes, you can change, pause, or cancel your meal subscription at any time with no penalties.
faq.q5: How accurate is the calorie tracking?
faq.a5: Our database includes 500,000+ foods and uses AI to provide accurate nutritional information for your logged meals.
faq.a6: Yes, we use bank-level encryption to protect all your personal and health data. Your privacy is our top priority.

testimonials.description: Join thousands of satisfied customers who transformed their health with YamiFit

cta.description: Join thousands of users who are already achieving their fitness goals with YamiFit. Start your free 7-day trial today!
cta.noCreditCard: No credit card required. Cancel anytime.

footer.description: Your trusted nutrition and wellness platform, empowering you with personalized meal plans, expert coaching, and smart tracking tools.

assessment.bmiNormalDetails: Your BMI is in the healthy range. Maintain your current lifestyle!
assessment.bmiUnderweightDetails: BMI below 18.5 is underweight. Consider increasing caloric intake.
assessment.bmiObeseDetails: BMI above 30 is considered obese. Please consult with a healthcare professional.

dietAppliance.clientNotAssigned: This client is not assigned to you.
dietAppliance.dietPlanDescription: Describe the dietary recommendations, meal plans, and nutritional guidelines.
dietAppliance.dietPlanPlaceholder:
Example:

Breakfast (7:00 AM):
- 2 eggs + whole grain toast
- Fresh fruits

Lunch (12:00 PM):
- Grilled chicken breast (150g)
- Brown rice (1 cup)
- Mixed vegetables

Dinner (7:00 PM):
- Salmon (150g)
- Quinoa salad
- Steamed broccoli

Snacks:
- Greek yogurt
- Almonds (handful)
- Protein shake post-workout
dietAppliance.exercisePlanDescription: Describe the workout routine, exercises, sets, reps, and schedule.
dietAppliance.exercisePlanPlaceholder:
Example:

Monday - Upper Body:
- Bench Press: 4x8-10
- Dumbbell Rows: 4x10
- Shoulder Press: 3x12
- Bicep Curls: 3x12
- Tricep Dips: 3x12

Wednesday - Lower Body:
- Squats: 4x10
- Romanian Deadlifts: 4x10
- Leg Press: 3x12
- Calf Raises: 4x15
- Lunges: 3x12 each leg

Friday - Full Body:
- Deadlifts: 4x8
- Pull-ups: 3xMax
- Push-ups: 3x15
- Plank: 3x60s
dietAppliance.notesPlaceholder: Any special instructions, modifications, or reminders...
dietAppliance.makePlanVisible: Make this plan visible to the client
dietAppliance.deletePlanDescription: This action cannot be undone. The plan will be permanently deleted.
dietAppliance.provideDietOrExercise: Please provide at least a diet or exercise plan.
